meta.title: Projects | Kris French Web Development
meta.description: A selection of recent website projects I have completed for local businesses in Zushi, Hayama, and Kamakura, as well as international clients.

intro.heading: Showcasing My Work
intro.body: Here are examples of the websites I have designed and developed, demonstrating my approach to modern, bilingual, and user-friendly web design.

cta.heading: Let Us Build Something Great
cta.body: If you like what you see, I would be happy to discuss how we can create a website that works for your business.
